DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open-label , within-patient , multi-center study Lymphoseek detection lymph nodes subject know cancer cervix . All subject receive single dose 50 µg Lymphoseek radiolabeled 2 mCi ( 74 MBq ) Tc 99m .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Pathology Status Lymphoseek®-Identified Sentinel Lymph Nodes Relative Pathological Pathology Status Nonsentinel Lymph Nodes Nodal Staging Subjects With Known Cancer Cervix Who Are Undergoing Lymph Node Dissection
